name: Quick Drag

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Improved Drag, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: On your turn, you can perform a single drag combat maneuver (Advanced Players Guide 320) in place of one of your melee attacks. You must choose the melee attack with the highest base attack bonus to make the drag.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: A drag combat maneuver is a standard action.
sections.name: Normal

description: You drag your enemy and deliver a punishing blow.
